name: Scenario_PreAlpha_BuildingBattle
journelText: Our travels took us to a large tower structure. Andy informed me that it was once an "A part of men's complex". The structure was vast and thick with potential loot but as we entered an antrim on one of the upper floors, the building's denizens made there presence know as undead began to shamble in from every entryway. [PAGE BREAK] [BUTTON](BATTLE_PreAlpha Battle Building Horde[_]PostBattle_PreAlpha_BuildingBattle){We had no choice but to fight.}
